statements: DELETE FROM regulatory_audits WHERE audit_id = 100 AND compliance_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM regulatory_audits WHERE regulatory_body = 'FCC' AND audit_type = 'Security Compliance';
DELETE FROM regulatory_audits WHERE audit_id = 100 AND audit_type = 'Compliance';
DELETE FROM regulatory_inspections WHERE inspected_entity = 'ABC Corp' AND inspection_result = 'Non-compliance';
DELETE FROM inspections WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM inspections WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND inspection_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM regulations WHERE regulation_name = 'Environmental Compliance';
